author: stevel
msg: added changes to exec, and a bit on the immutability fixes in the 'this may break things' section

author: stevel
msg: Submitted by: alan@coldsmoke.com (Alan Arvesen), greg_fenton@yahoo.com (Greg Fenton)

Fixed the 4NT test as suggested, tested it by running the batch file without echoes. 4NT 4.00A actually works properly without the fix, because it understands NT CMD shell variables better. This fix should support earlier versions.

author: stevel
msg: report a timeout to the log

author: stevel
msg: new method, killedProcess() which returns true if there is a watchdog and it killed the process
